title: Understanding the Design Principles of Terahertz Detectors Utilizing Metasurface Couplers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning using digital devices to experience real-world engineering problem-solving processes.

learning_goals: Explain the operating principles of terahertz detectors and the design concept of metamaterial couplers
Analyze the impact of Fano resonance phenomena on detector performance in relation to quantitative data
Interpret simulation results modeling the coupled structure of split-ring resonators (SRR) and bowtie antennas
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
